title: NFL ATL: 'This Year's Michael Bennett (or Brent Grimes)...'
itunes:title: NFL ATL: 'This Year's Michael Bennett (or Brent Grimes)...'
description:
A room full of heroes -- Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Marc Sessler and Chris Wesseling -- reflects upon the latest offseason headlines, including Cam Newton’s ankle surgery and the trade rumors swirling about DeSean Jackson.  Don’t miss out as the gang predicts which free agent can turn a one-year “prove it” deal into a long-term contract with a big campaign -- a player they have fondly dubbed "this year’s Michael Bennett (or Brent Grimes)."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
